titles.title: SPUR Housing Act
Sparking Production of Urban and Rural Housing Act
SPUR Housing Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish an emerging developer fund program to provide competitive grants to nonprofit housing organizations and community development financial institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
